original_title: Lush: A Far From Home Movie
overview: Between 1992 and 1996 Phil King took an old ’80s Sankyo Super 8 camera pretty much wherever he went with Lush. Mostly  filming on tour – in Japan, Europe and especially the US (Lush Into America) – and also on video and film shoots and to recording studios.
title: Lush: A Far From Home Movie
